Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 77th overall pick, by Texas in 1983...
Injured on 4/24/1986 with a Tight Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/15/1986 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Injured on 6/21/1986 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1991, off Charlie Lea (BOS)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Detroit on 7/18/1991...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1991...
Traded from Texas to Boston on 1/31/1992 (Going to TEX: P H. Pichardo. Going to BOS: LF G. Young)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Oakland on 9/5/1992...
Hit first career homerun on 4/19/1993, off Mark W. Davis (CLE)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Texas on 6/14/1993...
Injured on 8/30/1993 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (A) on 9/20/1993...
Injured on 9/21/1994 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 4/11/1996...
